name: Kaffeepause
description:
It's one of those days at work where the only thing that keeps you alive is the smell of brownish colored water served in a paper cup in your haunted office canteen. But today is a bit different; today there is a new guy in Haunts&Sons and you suddenly are determined to catch his attention at all costs!

-----------------------

This was initially just a playground for myself, because I was working on other games and on university assignments. When I realized how much work I already invested in the artwork and shaders and the like, I could not bring myself to just leave it there, though. This game is not big or impressive, but every single thing is handdrawn and crafted with passion. 

I finished this game for the FFS Jam now and hope someone will like what I did.  Any feedback is highly appreciated. 

  • The game is playable in English
  • There are cute ghosts
  • Handdrawn animations and images throughout
  • You can steal coffee from Johan
  • You can throw said coffee cup at him
  • You can poke him until he explodes and leaves
  • You can collect four items while playing and they will appear in the main menu
  • Annoy-O-Meter shows Johan's annoyance level
  • The food plate will change with each (continuing) playthrough and show different items
  • After the first playthrough there is a slightly different dialogue for replayability

Music was composed by the fantastic Manuel Saenz
Game and art were all made by me, Tanija

-----------------------

If you like what I do please consider donating a coffee for a buck!

-----------------------
